## Lab 1, SOLUTIONS (DATA 2.7)

```{r cars}
dat=read.csv("/home/jayibex/Desktop/Data_Sets/Chapter 2/Problems/data-prob-2-7.csv", header = T)
x=dat[,2]
y=dat[,1]
n=length(x)

Sxx=sum(x^2)-sum(x)^2/n
Sxy=sum(x*y)-sum(x)*sum(y)/n

#LS estimates
B1H=Sxy/ Sxx
B1H

B0H=mean(y)-mean(x)*B1H
B0H
```



Problem 2. The estimate of the true error variance Ïƒ^2 is MSres given below


```{r}
res = y- (B0H + x*B1H)
SSres = sum(res^2)
MSres = SSres/(n-2)
MSres
```


```{r}

#estimated/fitted SLR line
yH=B0H + sort(x)*B1H

#plotting
plot(x,y)
lines(sort(x),yH, col="red")

```
